qa_pair.question: In the evaluation dataset folder, locate the subfolder that holds financial planning documents. Among the budget files stored there, which year had all four quarters funded with non-zero amounts? What was that year's documented total budget figure?

Find the subfolder in the evaluation dataset that contains personnel information. A roster file inside it lists team members with their join dates. How many team members joined the company before the year 2021?
One project file in the top-level evaluation folder describes a completed infrastructure effort involving migration to the cloud. Who was designated as lead for that project?

A glossary file in the evaluation dataset defines several business abbreviations. One entry includes a current measured value alongside the abbreviation's definition. What is that current measured value?
Among the project files stored directly in the top-level evaluation folder, one describes an active customer-facing redesign initiative. What is the budget amount allocated to that project?
How many text files (not folders) are stored directly inside the folder named "mcp-eval-data"? Do not count files in subfolders.
According to the personnel roster in the evaluation dataset, what is the join date of the team member with the longest tenure? Answer in YYYY-MM-DD format.
Add together the total annual budget figures from all years documented in the finance subfolder of the evaluation dataset. What is their combined sum?
The completed project in the evaluation dataset has an explicit end date recorded in its file. What is that end date? Answer in YYYY-MM-DD format.
What is the name of the subfolder inside "mcp-eval-data" that contains only files related to financial planning? Answer with the exact folder name.
